title: Sales & Business Development Head
tagsAndSkills: alcohol,Brewery,Liquor,Beverage,Wine,Corporate Selling,sales head,Corporate Business Development

placeholders.label: Mumbai Suburbs, Navi Mumbai, Mumbai (All Areas)

jobDescription:
We are hiring for Business development & Sales for an Techno Event Management company


Company name- a leading techno event company (Parent company is a production house)


Address :- Andheri West (Having offices in Mahalakshmi /khar & Andheri)


Notice period 0-15 days (Not more than 15 days)

Address - Andheri West,


Can call on 022-40108494 for more details


Job responsibilites :-

1.Venue Location Finalization and Vendor Partnership:
Identify suitable locations for events.
Establish partnerships with venue owners and vendors for fabrication, catering, and other event requirements.
Negotiate terms and finalize contracts ensuring cost-effectiveness and quality standards.

2.Building Exclusive Relationships with 3rd Party Event Agencies:

Research and identify reputable event agencies.
Cultivate strong and exclusive relationships with key event agencies.

Collaborate closely with these agencies to ensure seamless event execution.

3.Acting as the Point of Contact (POC) for Events:
Serve as the primary point of contact for all events
Coordinate with internal teams and external partners to ensure all event requirements are met.
Provide exceptional customer service and address any issues or concerns promptly.
4.Execution of Events:
Oversee the execution of events from start to finish, ensuring all aspects run smoothly.
Coordinate logistics, including setup, teardown, and onsite management.

Ensure events align with brand image and objectives.

5.Partnerships with Food and Beverage Outlets and Alcohol Provider Companies:

Identify potential F&B outlets and alcohol provider companies for strategic partnerships.
Develop mutually beneficial partnerships focusing on product offerings and promotional activities.
Maintain strong relationships with partners to enhance event experiences.
6.Partnerships with Local Vendors for Fabrication:
Identify local vendors specializing in fabrication services for events.
Establish partnerships with selected vendors to ensure high-quality fabrication.

Manage vendor relationships and ensure timely delivery of fabricated materials.

These KRAs emphasize the Sales and Business Development role's responsibilities in finalizing venue locations, building partnerships, executing events, and ensuring success

Snd your cv o sweeta@focusonIT.com or call on 022-40108494
